content: the pan protectors are used to protect your non-stick pans from scratching one another if you stack them in your cupboard they are made using breakaway crochet method techniques which means all the little yo-yos are crocheted continuously and joined-as-you-go each protector only requires 1 50gm ball of dk / 8ply yarn so a good way to use up the odd balls in your stash a great present for the home chef or an unusual item to make and sell in market stalls video tutorial available on youtube 1 see breakawaycrochet com 2 for more information on the breakaway crochet method 1 https //youtu be/rgq7-dcdglu 2 https //breakawaycrochet com
